name: Just A Typical Day In The Wild West
name_original: Just A Typical Day In The Wild West
description:
Just a typical day in the Wild West! Except.. the targets that you practice your aim on everyday have come to life, and are attacking!!! You must fight for your life as the endless wave of targets approach you!

Controls (Only tested so far on the oculus quest 2, but should work on all steam-supported VR headsets):

Locomotion (continuous movement) - Left Joystick (oculus)

Snap turning - Right joystick (oculus)

Grabbing - side triggers on oculus controllers (has to be held down otherwise object will be dropped)

Shooting - main triggers (oculus controllers)
